content: Hello! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?
I am Jarvis, a highly advanced AI chatbot with access to real-time information from the internet. I'm here to help answer your questions to the best of my abilities.
Parv Luthra is a popular Indian YouTuber and tech reviewer. He is known for his in-depth reviews of smartphones, laptops, and other gadgets.

Kuber Mehta is a well-known Indian YouTuber and entrepreneur. He is the founder of the YouTube channel "Kuber Nation" where he shares his insights on stock market investing, personal finance, and entrepreneurship.
